snippet.title: Nivalis - Official Summer 2024 Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description: Welcome to Nivalis! Making it in this cyberpunk city isn’t easy. The gangs want to harvest your organs, the Corps will fine you for breathing, and the whole time, the ground under your feet is crumbling. This city could fall into the ocean tomorrow, so you better make your fortune today. Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing, and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds. Nivalis is set to be available in Spring 2025. Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1488490/Nivalis/
